citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:55am on
September 14th 2022. Upon arrival the inspector knocked on the front door and when there wasn't an answer called an
left a voice message. The licensee called back within 5 minutes and stated that they were out of town and that a
responsible adult would not be available for inspection on this date.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:55am on 
September 14th 2022.  Upon arrival the inspector knocked on the front door and when there wasn't an answer called an 
left a voice message.  The licensee called back within 5 minutes and stated that they were out of town and that a 
responsible adult would not be available for inspection on this date. 
 
 
 
End Section
